events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's request mentions wanting a refund for the product received, categorizing this case as a Refund.
Assigning this refund case to the billing support team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund request so I can expedite the process?
My order number is 123456789. The product doesn't meet the description on your website, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within two business days.
Thank you for your quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you are handling this!
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please check your email for the refund confirmation and let us know if you have any other questions.
Just following up to ensure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since there have been no further replies, we are closing this refund case. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
